page.title: 20Hopes and Fears
page.content: The staff of{Eastfield School}were asked for their thoughts on the {future:} Most of them thought the world was in rather a sorry state and expressed a hope that solutions to the famines and fighting could be found. The job prospects for school-leavers was also a sore point and arms race proved a worry for many. The hopes for the future included a more understanding world, a desire for people to look for common ground rather than looking for faults in others and a hope that the present inbalance in wealth between the "haves" and "have-nots" could be bridged. The biggest hope for the future is PEACE.
